# archestra_role (Resource)

Manages an Archestra RBAC role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "archestra_role" "developer" {
  name = "Developer"
  permissions = [
    "agents:read",
    "agents:create",
    "agents:update",
    "agents:delete",
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the role
- `permissions` (Set of String) List of permissions in 'resource:action' format (e.g., 'agents:read')

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Role identifier
